name: VIRUS DELETE
description:
This was made for the LM0B game jam(theme was "restart")

I procrastinated on this a lot so I really ended up only having 2 days to work on it, so it's going to be bad

you're an antivirus and you have to collect pieces of the power buttons to restart the computer

the difficulty increases each win with a cap of 5 spawner's but no cap on bullet speed

default controls: wasd to move
